eg.ui.filetree

Class PopupMenu

  • java.lang.Object
    • eg.ui.filetree.PopupMenu

  • public class PopupMenu
extends java.lang.Object
    A popup menu with menu items for actions that can be selected after a file node or a folder node was right clicked

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int FILE_OPT
      The constant for indicating that items for file operations are shown
      static int FOLDER_OPT
      The constant for indicating that items for folder operations are shown

      Sets the boolean that specifies if the item for deleting actions is enabled or disabled

      Shows the menu at the specified component
